insights.populationGrowth: Slow growth 0.6% with limited economic opportunities driving youth migration to urban areas.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 78% literacy. Rural location limits access to higher education.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 58%, forestry 15%, small industry 12%, government 10%, services 5%.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional houses 75%, modern houses 20%, temporary shelters 5%.

insights.temperature: Subtropical climate, mild winters (12°C), hot summers (32°C). Lower elevation creates warmer conditions.
insights.precipitation: High precipitation 2,200mm with intense monsoons supporting agriculture and forests.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter, hot pre-monsoon, heavy monsoon, pleasant post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Monsoon flooding, landslides, occasional droughts, pest outbreaks.

recentDisasters.impact: Village access cut off, evacuations needed

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Low - Rural location with limited infrastructure
